system.description:
Barbarians are fierce warriors who rely on primal fury and instinct. They favor mobility and raw power over heavy armor and shields.

Alignment

Any nonlawful.

Key Class Features

  • Fast Movement: Land speed is faster than normal (+10 ft.) when not wearing heavy armor or carrying a heavy load.
  • Rage: Fly into a rage a number of times per day, gaining +4 Str, +4 Con, +2 morale on Will saves, and -2 AC. Duration: 3 + Con modifier rounds. At the end, the barbarian is fatigued (unless 17th level).
  • Uncanny Dodge (2nd): Retain Dex bonus to AC when flat-footed or struck by invisible attackers.
  • Trap Sense (3rd): +1 bonus on Reflex saves vs. traps and dodge AC vs. trap attacks, improving every 3 levels.
  • Damage Reduction (7th): Subtract 1 from weapon/natural attack damage (improves at 10th and every 3 levels).
  • Greater Rage (11th): Rage bonuses increase to +6 Str, +6 Con, +3 Will.
  • Mighty Rage (20th): Rage bonuses increase to +8 Str, +8 Con, +4 Will.

Ex-barbarians: A barbarian who becomes lawful loses the ability to rage and cannot gain more barbarian levels.
